explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a hybrid unsupervised machine learning model for credit risk assessment.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper focuses on unsupervised classification techniques and their challenges in credit risk assessment.
explanations.semi-supervised learning: The proposed method combines spectral clustering with a semi-supervised support vector machine (SVM).
explanations.classification: The paper addresses classification techniques in the context of credit risk assessment.
explanations.support vector machine: The proposed model includes a semi-supervised support vector machine (SVM) as part of its hybrid approach.
explanations.SVM: The paper explicitly mentions the use of a semi-supervised support vector machine (SVM) in the proposed model.
explanations.clustering: The paper utilizes spectral clustering as part of the hybrid unsupervised classification method.
